<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/userops/{address}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches user operations for a specific wallet address, including transactions, user operation hashes, and related activity data.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

</RequestSchema>
